text.headline: EUC Events
text.text: World of EUC events timeline. Use the navigation arrows to view past and upcoming events or use the list below to find an event.

text.headline: Citrix Community Lab Project
text.text: In this webinar you will learn about the new and upcoming Citrix Community Lab Project, what it means to you and how you can get involved.

text.headline: End User Computing and Nutanix
text.text: Learn about Nutanix Clusters, EUC and Hybrid Cloud.
